website_summaries.verdict: While the organic, natural formula and delightful scent is impressive, others on our short list offer similar qualities for more product and lower price points.
pros: Formulated with numerous plant-based oils and vegan ingredients in smooth gel
Pleasant lavender scent for an aromatherapy experience
cons: Somewhat pricey for what you get
Some users gripe that it was drying to their skin

customer_reviews.title: Safe for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love that this body wash is safe enough to use on my little girl's sensitive skin. Doesn't dry out your skin like so many body washes do. The lavender scent is subtle and refreshing. Even my teenaged son likes it!
customer_reviews.author: 4Appels

customer_reviews.title: and I like it. The soapy moisturizing is more than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it this morning, and I like it. The soapy moisturizing is more than I anticipated from an organic wash with no chemical ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Mason

customer_reviews.title: Love the lavender smell and that this is all natural
customer_reviews.text: Love the lavender smell and that this is all natural! Gives me peace of mind to know that I'm not putting any potentially harmful chemicals on my body. If you don't like the smell of lavender oil this probably isn't for you - it is pretty strong, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JBoogie

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing on the skin.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this feels during and after the shower
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lavender suds are the perfect way to start my mornings!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley I.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Gel
customer_reviews.text: I started using Pangea after reading articles on sodium lauryl sulfate being so hard on the hair and skin. It was the first shower gel I tried without it and like it so much that I haven't bother to try any others on the market.
customer_reviews.author: S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent, just wish for a bigger size bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightly scented body wash, with the warmth of the cardamon blending nicely with lavender. It's not super sudsy, which I like, but some people might want more suds. I've always liked their lip balm - it's one of the best I've used and lasts a long, long time - so I was interested in trying other products from Pangea. I only took one star off because it's a pretty small amount for the price. I also like EO body washes, and they come in a more reasonable size.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: It smell good. Doesn’t lather a lot, but it’s not too bad. Fragrance do any last past the rinse stage. Still looking for a good bath gel.
customer_reviews.author: Sassyqban@

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great as a body wash in the bath because it doesn't sud up too much.
customer_reviews.author: cgraves

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it, but it's not for me
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I love the company and what they stand for and the fact that the product is all organic and cruelty free, but I just cannot get over the smell! It is very pungent and not enjoyable at all. The first time that I used it was at night and when I got into bed after my shower my husband crinkled his nose and said "What is that smell??". If they could do something about the fragrance I would try the brand again, but as of now I will finish the bottle so I feel like I get my money's worth and will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: I dislike it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a search for a great body wash without Sodium Laurel Sulfate or Sodium Laureth (I think) Sulfate and I came across this one. It's a decent price but it's not worth the money for the following reasons: Not enough for the price It smells HORRIBLE It was packaged poorly because about a quarter spilled out and was all over the plastic I don't feel a difference with my skin at all And, once again, it's smells HORRIBLE! Overall, I wouldn't recommend this product. I think the product was a complete waste of money and now my hunt continues.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I love Pangea Organics products and have been using them for years. I also purchase duplicate items for a good friend for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better than bathing in organics
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years. Not overly perfume-y like so many drugstore brands. The lather is great. I use a Body Mate sponge with it: pour on an amount the size of a nickle and washes my whole body. The bottle lasts about two months. I used to buy it at drugstore.com, but now I see I have to go direct to the company website, as the sellers here on Amazon are out of the US.
customer_reviews.author: Tough Choice
